title: email alert
content: How do I turn off the red number that appears in my email icon? Sometimes I come back to my computer & it is showing 50 or maybe 100 as being the times it has alerted me to an email in my inbox. Worse still is when I have no emails to collect it labours for ages trying to download something & it then stops but has an alerts that I have mail to collect.Drives me mad. TIA
creator: brucejamescooke

title: no emails
content: I am unable to send or receive emails I have not received any emails since 21 June 2023
